Class LoanRepository

java.lang.Object
persistence.LoanRepository
public class LoanRepository extends Object
Repository class responsible for managing Loan entities in-memory.

Responsibilities:

  • Store and retrieve loan records.
  • Centralize search and filtering logic for loans.

Note: In-memory, non-thread-safe; data is lost when the app stops.

  • Constructor Details

    • LoanRepository

      public LoanRepository()
      Creates a new LoanRepository instance.

      Note: This class primarily uses static storage; the instance is provided for APIs that prefer injection.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public static void save(Loan loan)
      Persists a new loan.
      Parameters:
      loan - the Loan to save

    • findAllActive

      public static List<Loan> findAllActive()
      Retrieves all active (non-returned) loans.
      Returns:
      list of active loans (never null)

    • findAll

      public static List<Loan> findAll()
      Retrieves all loans (active and returned).
      Returns:
      list of all loans (never null)

    • findActiveByIsbn

      public static Loan findActiveByIsbn(String isbn)
      Finds the active loan for a specific book ISBN, if any.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the book ISBN
      Returns:
      matching active loan, or null if none found

    • findActiveByMember

      public static List<Loan> findActiveByMember(String memberId)
      Finds all active (non-returned) loans for a given member.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member identifier
      Returns:
      list of active loans for the member (never null)

    • markReturned

      public static void markReturned(Loan loan)
      Marks the given loan as returned.
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to update

    • remove

      public static void remove(Loan loan)
      Removes a loan from the repository.
      Parameters:
      loan - the loan to remove

    • clearLoans

      public static void clearLoans()
      Clears all loans (useful for tests).

    • findActiveByMemberAndIsbn

      public static Loan findActiveByMemberAndIsbn(String memberId, String isbn)
      Finds a single active loan for the given member and ISBN.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member identifier
      isbn - the book ISBN
      Returns:
      matching active loan, or null if none found

    • findAllActiveOverdue

      public static List<Loan> findAllActiveOverdue(LocalDate today)
      Finds all active loans that are overdue as of the given date.
      Parameters:
      today - the date used to evaluate overdue status
      Returns:
      list of overdue active loans (never null)

    • findActiveOverdueByMember

      public List<Loan> findActiveOverdueByMember(String memberId, LocalDate today)
      Instance-level query for tests and services that prefer injected repositories. Returns active (non-returned) overdue loans for a specific member as of the given date.
      Parameters:
      memberId - the member identifier whose loans will be inspected
      today - the reference date used to determine whether a loan is overdue
      Returns:
      a list of the member's active overdue loans as of today (never null)
